description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A simple combine three puzzle game. Both single and splitscreen play is available.  Your goal is to remove as many stars from the grid as possible. You remove stars by combining them in groups of 3 or more. Try to leave as few stray stars behind as possible, with a little luck you might get rid of all 81 of them. Beware, you might get stuck.
description.short: A simple combine three puzzle game. Both single and splitscreen play is available.  Your goal is to remove as many stars from the grid as possible. You remove stars by combining them in groups of 3 or more. Try to leave as few stray stars behind as possible, with a little luck you might get rid of all 81 of them. Beware, you might get stuck.
